CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 24, 1955, pg. 1 reads: "Saint Nick's Visit Causes Smiles And Tears - Santa Belongs to All Kids - And he did! More than 1,500 wriggling, awe-struck children of both races jammed East Liberty Library Auditorium's every inch of floor space Saturday and hundreds more hung around outside waiting to get in later, when Santa Claus (Thomas Rose), above, helped entertain them with free movies, hot dogs and pop, and a bag for each of presents, goodies, and fruit to take home.  It was all part of the Sportsman's Legion Post's Annual Kiddies Christmas Party. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of boys, girls, women, and men, including Thomas Rose wearing Santa Claus costume, gathered on stage in East Liberty Library Auditorium, with crowd in background for Christmas party
